item.title: Legal
item.description: Privacy Policy At Equilaterus, accessible from equilaterus.com, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by Equilaterus and how we use it. If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us. This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with regards to the information that they shared and/or collect in Equilaterus.

item.title: Linux release PlasticSCM+GitHub
item.description: Improve your game development workflow: access your Github tasks directly from Plastic!

item.title: Released Unreal Utility AI
item.description: We have released version 1.0.2 of our Utility AI configurator for Unreal Engine.

item.title: Released Unreal Dialog System
item.description: We have released version 1.3.0 of our Dialog System for Unreal Engine, Rincewind Editor.

item.title: Contact
item.description: We are looking forward to hearing from you. Address: 30 N Gould St, Sheridan, WY 82801. Email: info@equilaterus.com

item.description: Improve your game development workflow: access your Github tasks directly from Plastic!

item.title: Comming soon: The Science of Code v2
item.description: We are preparing the upcoming release of The Science of Code v2, a brand new version of our open source community.

item.title: Released functional library for .Net Core
item.description: Write elegant and testeable solutions on C# using a Monadic Framework. Our free and open source library enables funcional power in ASP Core.

item.title: Released Bootstrap Superset
item.description: We have released our friendly but powerful Bootstrap superset. Create beautiful websites with Bootlaterus.

item.title: Released CLI Tools for Powershell
item.description: We have released a new solution to make easier than ever writing Powershell utilities.

item.title: Released Windows-SSD
item.description: Powershell scripts to automate symbolic link generation for SSD units on Windows.

item.title: Compress your images without lossing quality
item.description: We have released a friendly Windows Application that compress images achieving excellent results.
